en: Excuse me, but may I put my books here?
zh: 不好意思，我能把书放这儿吗？

en: Sorry, we can't fill this prescription here.
zh: 对不起，我们这儿开不了这个处方。

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me where the post office is?
zh: 不好意思，请问邮局在哪儿？

en: Excuse me, but might I use the phone?
zh: 不好意思，我能用一下电话吗？

en: Excuse me, but where is the library?
zh: 请问，图书馆在哪儿？

en: Will you open the window, please?
zh: 麻烦你开一下窗户好吗？

en: Excuse me, but can you help me?
zh: 不好意思，能帮我个忙吗？

en: Sorry, but I want to tell her this news face to face.
zh: 不好意思，我想当面跟她讲这个消息。

en: Sorry, but I want to tell him this news face to face.
zh: 不好意思，我想当面跟他讲这个消息。

en: Excuse me, do you have the time?
zh: 不好意思，请问现在几点了？

en: I'm sorry, but I don't feel like going out today.
zh: 抱歉，我今天不想出门。

en: Sorry, but I have to hurry. I have no time to explain this in detail.
zh: 抱歉，我得赶时间，没空细说。

en: Excuse me, but could you show me the way to the station?
zh: 不好意思，请问去车站怎么走？

en: Excuse me, but will you show me the way to the station?
zh: 不好意思，能告诉我车站怎么走吗？

en: Would you please give me some more tea?
zh: 麻烦再给我加点茶，好吗？

en: Excuse me. Can you direct me to the nearest subway station?
zh: 不好意思，请问最近的地铁站在哪儿？

en: Will you please let me go now?
zh: 现在能让我走了吗？

en: I'm sorry, could you repeat that please?
zh: 抱歉，能请您再说一遍吗？

en: Excuse me, but will you tell me the way to the Hilton Hotel?
zh: 不好意思，请问希尔顿酒店怎么走？

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the bus stop?
zh: 不好意思，请问公交站怎么走？

en: Excuse me, but will you tell me where to change trains?
zh: 不好意思，请问在哪儿换乘？

en: Sorry, but I'm not very interested in that subject.
zh: 抱歉，我对那个话题不太感兴趣。

en: Do me a favor by switching off that radio.
zh: 麻烦帮我把收音机关了。

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me how to get to Central Park?
zh: 不好意思，请问中央公园怎么走？

en: Excuse me, but may I exchange this sweater for another?
zh: 不好意思，这件毛衣能换一件吗？

en: Would you please lend me some money?
zh: 能借我点儿钱吗？

en: Excuse me, but could you do me a favor?
zh: 不好意思，能帮我个忙吗？

en: I beg your pardon, but would you repeat what you said?
zh: 抱歉，能麻烦您把刚才的话再说一遍吗？

en: Sorry, I couldn't catch what you said.
zh: 抱歉，我没听清你刚才说什么。

en: I'm sorry, but I think you're mistaken.
zh: 抱歉，我觉得你搞错了。

en: Excuse me, could you spare me a few minutes? I have a favor to ask you.
zh: 不好意思，能耽误你几分钟吗？我想请你帮个忙。

en: Sorry, but it all came about so suddenly that I haven't got a handle on the situation yet.
zh: 抱歉，这事儿太突然了，我还没搞清楚状况。

en: I'm sorry, but that's all we have right now.
zh: 抱歉，我们现在只有这些了。

en: Sorry? Pardon?
zh: 不好意思，您说什么？

en: Excuse me. How often do shuttle buses run to downtown New York?
zh: 不好意思，去纽约市中心的班车多久一趟？

en: Sorry, the line is busy now.
zh: 抱歉，电话占线。

en: Excuse me, I think you're sitting in my seat.
zh: 不好意思，你好像坐了我的位置。

en: Excuse me, does this train go to Washington Square?
zh: 不好意思，请问这趟车去华盛顿广场吗？

en: I'm sorry, I'm busy right now.
zh: 抱歉，我现在挺忙的。

en: I'm sorry I did you wrong.
zh: 抱歉，是我对不住你。

en: Sorry sir, I'm afraid he may not be in.
zh: 抱歉先生，他可能不在。

en: I'm sorry, I dialed the wrong number.
zh: 抱歉，我打错电话了。

en: Excuse me, I'm lost.
zh: 不好意思，我迷路了。

en: Excuse me. May I get by?
zh: 不好意思，让一下。

en: I'm sorry. I have another appointment.
zh: 抱歉，我还有别的安排。

en: I'm sorry. Would you mind turning around?
zh: 抱歉，能请你转过身去吗？

en: Excuse me. I'd like to rent a car.
zh: 你好，我想租辆车。

en: Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
zh: 不好意思，我下一站要下车。

en: Excuse me, but I feel sick.
zh: 不好意思，我感觉不太舒服。

en: I'm sorry, you are not allowed to.
zh: 抱歉，这里不可以。

en: Sorry, I've got my hands full now.
zh: 不好意思，我现在手头有点忙。

en: I'm sorry, but I didn't catch what you said.
zh: 不好意思，我没听清你刚才说什么。

en: Excuse me, would you mind repeating that?
zh: 不好意思，能请你再说一遍吗？

en: Excuse me, could you say that again more slowly?
zh: 不好意思，能请你再说慢一点吗？

en: Sorry. I beg your pardon?
zh: 抱歉，你刚才说什么？

en: Excuse me, but we're in a hurry, too.
zh: 不好意思，我们也很赶时间。

en: Excuse me. May I get through?
zh: 不好意思，借过一下。

en: Sorry, I wish you wouldn't.
zh: 抱歉，希望你别这样。

en: Excuse me, is this seat taken?
zh: 不好意思，这儿有人坐吗？

en: I'm sorry, we can't make flight changes on this ticket.
zh: 抱歉，这张票不能改签。

en: Excuse me, but I think this is my seat.
zh: 不好意思，我觉得这好像是我的座位。

en: Sorry, I can't accommodate you.
zh: 抱歉，我帮不了你。

en: Excuse me, officer, where are we now?
zh: 警察同志，请问我们现在在哪儿？

en: Someone is hiding in the corner.
zh: 角落里躲着一个人。

en: Who is the man sitting in the corner?
zh: 坐在角落里那个男的是谁？

en: Mrs. Smith is bearing up well since the death of her husband.
zh: 史密斯夫人在丈夫去世后挺过来了。

en: Mrs. Smith is an elderly lady.
zh: 史密斯夫人是一位老太太。

en: Mrs. Smith was a famous beauty.
zh: 史密斯夫人以前是个著名的大美女。

en: Mrs. Smith goes to church by car.
zh: 史密斯夫人开车去教堂。

en: Mrs. Smith is in black.
zh: 史密斯夫人穿了一身黑。

en: Mrs. Smith is our English teacher.
zh: 史密斯夫人是我们的英语老师。

en: Mrs. Smith is actively engaged in volunteer work.
zh: 史密斯夫人积极参与志愿者工作。

en: Mrs. Smith can get her husband to do anything she likes.
zh: 史密斯夫人能让她丈夫做任何她想让他做的事。

en: You could say that Mrs. Smith is a television addict.
zh: 可以说史密斯夫人是个电视迷。

en: Mrs. Smith gave birth to her second child.
zh: 史密斯夫人生了第二个孩子。

en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith are a good match.
zh: 史密斯夫妇俩很般配。

en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith live apart from each other now.
zh: 史密斯夫妇现在分居了。

en: The Smiths had their house painted white.
zh: 史密斯家把房子刷成了白色。

en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith are the sort of couple who don't go out much in the evenings.
zh: 史密斯夫妇是那种晚上不太爱出门的人。

en: He's just about had enough of the Smiths' TV.
zh: 他已经受够了史密斯家的电视了。

en: Dr. Smith is the most knowledgeable expert in that subject.
zh: 史密斯博士是那个领域最博学的专家。

en: Mr Smith drilled them in English pronunciation.
zh: 史密斯先生训练他们的英语发音。

en: Miss Smith is liked by all students.
zh: 史密斯小姐深受所有学生的喜爱。

en: Mr Smith teaches me English.
zh: 史密斯先生教我英语。

en: Mr Smith left Japan this morning.
zh: 史密斯先生今天早上离开日本了。

en: Is Miss Smith an English teacher?
zh: 史密斯小姐是英语老师吗？

en: Mr Smith is in charge of the class.
zh: 史密斯先生负责这个班。

en: Miss Smith teaches English at this school.
zh: 史密斯小姐在这所学校教英语。

en: Mr Smith always begins his lectures with a joke.
zh: 史密斯先生讲课总是以笑话开头。

en: Dr. Smith has a lot of patients.
zh: 史密斯医生有很多病人。

en: Who will be in charge of our class when Miss Smith leaves school?
zh: 史密斯小姐离校后，谁来负责我们班？

en: Mr Smith and I have been acquainted with each other for a long time.
zh: 我和史密斯先生认识很久了。

en: Mr Smith is a good teacher.
zh: 史密斯先生是个好老师。

en: Mr Smith hasn't turned up yet though he promised to.
zh: 史密斯先生虽然答应了，但还没露面。

en: Mr Smith married his daughter to a doctor.
zh: 史密斯先生把女儿嫁给了一个医生。

en: Mr Smith gave a lecture on literature.
zh: 史密斯先生做了一个关于文学的讲座。

en: Mr Smith made her his secretary.
zh: 史密斯先生让她当了他的秘书。

en: Mr Smith forgot to take his commuter ticket.
zh: 史密斯先生忘了带通勤票。

en: Mr Smith takes a good deal of exercise before breakfast.
zh: 史密斯先生早餐前会做大量运动。

en: Mr Smith is an eminent violinist.
zh: 史密斯先生是一位杰出的小提琴家。

en: Mr Smith sued them for damages.
zh: 史密斯先生起诉了他们，要求赔偿。

en: Mr Smith is a doctor by profession.
zh: 史密斯先生职业是医生。

en: Mr Smith had his letter typed.
zh: 史密斯先生让人把信打好了。

en: Mr Smith is a candidate for mayor.
zh: 史密斯先生在竞选市长。

en: Mr Smith is pleased at his son's success.
zh: 史密斯先生为他儿子的成功感到很高兴。

en: Mr Smith is accused of breach of contract.
zh: 史密斯先生被控违约。

en: Mr Smith proposed marriage to Jane.
zh: 史密斯先生向简求婚了。

en: Mr Smith is vulnerable to this kind of criticism.
zh: 史密斯先生很容易受这类批评的影响。

en: The study which Mr Smith specializes in is economics.
zh: 史密斯先生专业研究经济学。

en: Mr Smith had three sons who became engineers.
zh: 史密斯先生有三个儿子，后来都当了工程师。

en: I have a bowing acquaintance with Mr Smith.
zh: 我和史密斯先生只是点头之交。

en: I have a nodding acquaintance with Mr Smith.
zh: 我和史密斯先生只是点头之交。

en: Mr Smith was announced as the succeeding chairman.
zh: 宣布了由史密斯先生接任董事长。

en: Mr Smith founded this school forty years ago.
zh: 史密斯先生四十年前创办了这所学校。

en: Mr Smith is now president of this company.
zh: 史密斯先生现在是这家公司的总裁。

en: Professor Smith is recognized to be one of the greatest scholars in English philology.
zh: 史密斯教授被公认为是英语语言学界最伟大的学者之一。

en: Prof. Smith is famous for his eccentric life style.
zh: 史密斯教授以生活方式古怪而闻名。

en: Talking of Professor Smith, his assistant is hard of hearing.
zh: 说起史密斯教授，他的助手耳朵有点背。

en: The Smiths are all good people.
zh: 史密斯一家都是好人。

en: The Smiths moved to Ohio.
zh: 史密斯一家搬到了俄亥俄州。

en: Mr. Smith is sure to come on Sunday.
zh: 史密斯先生周日肯定会来。

en: Mr. Smith should have told the truth.
zh: 史密斯先生本该说实话的。

en: Smith died of a heart attack.
zh: 史密斯死于心脏病发作。

en: Smith demanded payment.
zh: 史密斯要求付钱。

en: Smith struck Jones out.
zh: 史密斯把琼斯三振出局了。

en: Smith argues that no international laws can be applied to this case.
zh: 史密斯认为任何国际法都不适用于本案。

en: Mr Smith has lived in Kyoto for three years.
zh: 史密斯先生在京都住了三年了。

en: Smith's approach differs greatly from others in that he did not take the affixation into consideration.
zh: 史密斯的方法与别人大不相同，因为他没有考虑到词缀。

en: The Smiths are our cousins.
zh: 史密斯一家是我们的亲戚。

en: The Smiths are our neighbors.
zh: 史密斯一家是我们的邻居。

en: Few people can run the machine as well as Mr Smith.
zh: 没几个人能像史密斯先生那样操作这台机器。

en: Mr Smith is too polite to say anything bad about others.
zh: 史密斯先生人太客气了，从不说别人坏话。

en: Mr Smith hasn't turned up yet though he promised to come.
zh: 史密斯先生虽然答应要来，但还没露面。

en: Mr Smith made him a doctor.
zh: 史密斯先生把他培养成了一名医生。

en: Mr Smith made it a rule to take a walk every morning.
zh: 史密斯先生习惯每天早上散步。

en: Mr Smith made him some toys.
zh: 史密斯先生给他做了一些玩具。

en: Mr Smith has not turned up yet though he promised to come.
zh: 史密斯先生虽然答应要来，但还没现身。

en: Mr Smith lost his way in the dense fog.
zh: 史密斯先生在浓雾中迷路了。

en: Mr Smith says, "I was born in New York."
zh: 史密斯先生说：“我出生在纽约。”

en: Mr Smith says, "I was born in New York, but my wife comes San Francisco."
zh: 史密斯先生说：“我出生在纽约，但我妻子来自旧金山。”

en: Mr Smith thinks that he's a big shot.
zh: 史密斯先生觉得自己是个大人物。

en: Mr Smith is now on duty.
zh: 史密斯先生现在正在值班。

en: Mr Smith lives in Kyoto now.
zh: 史密斯先生现在住在京都。

en: Mr Smith was bereaved of his wife.
zh: 史密斯先生失去了妻子。

en: Mr. Smith doesn't speak English, does he?
zh: 史密斯先生不讲英语吧？

en: Even though Mr Smith was very wealthy, he was a tight wad.
zh: 尽管史密斯先生很有钱，但他是个铁公鸡。

en: Mr Smith carried out the plan successfully.
zh: 史密斯先生成功地执行了那个计划。

en: Mr Smith is within shouting distance.
zh: 史密斯先生就在喊一声就能听到的地方。

en: Mr Smith is drinking coffee.
zh: 史密斯先生在喝咖啡。

en: Mr Smith lived in Kyoto three years ago.
zh: 史密斯先生三年前住在京都。

en: Mr Smith says he was born in New York, but that his wife comes from Japan.
zh: 史密斯先生说他出生在纽约，但他老婆是日本人。

en: Mr Smith, whose car I borrowed for this trip, is a rich lawyer.
zh: 史密斯先生是个很有钱的律师，我这次旅行借的就是他的车。

en: The Smiths live in my neighborhood.
zh: 史密斯一家住在我家附近。

en: A farewell party was held in honor of Mr Smith.
zh: 为史密斯先生办了一个欢送会。

en: Please connect me with Mr Smith.
zh: 请帮我接一下史密斯先生。

en: I tried to call Mr Smith, but the line was busy.
zh: 我刚才给史密斯先生打电话，但他那儿一直占线。

en: I would like to see Mr Smith.
zh: 我想见见史密斯先生。

en: Will you please connect me with Mr Smith?
zh: 能帮我接一下史密斯先生吗？

en: Mr Smith is an acquaintance of hers.
zh: 史密斯先生是她的一个熟人。

en: I've known Mr Smith for many years.
zh: 我认识史密斯先生很多年了。

en: A Mr Smith has come to see you.
zh: 有位史密斯先生来找你。

en: How long have you known Miss Smith?
zh: 你认识史密斯小姐多久了？

en: A Mr Smith came to see you during your absence.
zh: 你不在的时候，有一位史密斯先生来找过你。

en: Talking of Smith, what has become of his daughter?
zh: 说到史密斯，他女儿现在怎么样了？

en: A Mr Smith came to see you.
zh: 有个史密斯先生来找过你。

en: Mr Smith spoke so fast I couldn't take in what he said.
zh: 史密斯先生说得太快了，我根本没听明白。

en: Mrs. Smith, I'd like to introduce a friend of mine, Pierre Dubois.
zh: 史密斯太太，我想向您介绍一下我的朋友皮埃尔·杜布瓦。

en: He said that if Smith was elected, he would resign.
zh: 他说如果史密斯当选了，他就辞职。

en: Would you mind if I borrowed your car?
zh: 我借下你的车你不介意吧？

en: Excuse me, but I'm tied up now.
zh: 对不起，我现在脱不开身。

en: What am I going to do? I can't close my fly.
zh: 怎么办？我裤子拉链拉不上了。

en: A sponge absorbs water.
zh: 海绵吸水。

en: A sponge absorbs liquids.
zh: 海绵会吸收液体。

en: Your pants reach the floor.
zh: 你的裤子长得都扫地了。

en: Did Spot go, too?
zh: 斯波特也去了吗？

en: I have no leisure for sport.
zh: 我没空运动。

en: I like sport.
zh: 我喜欢运动。

en: Sports activities require a slender figure.
zh: 体育运动需要苗条的身材。

en: Poor eyesight is a handicap to a sportsman.
zh: 视力不好对运动员来说是个短板。

en: Sport is frankly mimic warfare.
zh: 说白了，体育运动就是模拟战争。

en: Sports nurture friendships.
zh: 运动可以增进友谊。

en: Apart from sports, I like listening to jazz music.
zh: 除了运动，我还喜欢听爵士乐。

en: Sports play an important role in social life.
zh: 体育在社交生活中起着很重要的作用。

en: I do not do sports.
zh: 我不运动。

en: Do you like playing sports?
zh: 你喜欢体育运动吗？

en: Sports help to develop our muscles.
zh: 运动可以锻炼肌肉。

en: Sports can be dangerous if safety is ignored.
zh: 如果不注意安全，运动也可能很危险。

en: You have to give up sports for a while.
zh: 你得暂时停下运动一段时间。

en: Sports keep us in good shape.
zh: 运动能让我们保持好身材。

en: Sports make us healthy in mind as well as in body.
zh: 运动能让我们身心健康。

en: The better players helped those who were not so good at sports.
zh: 厉害一点的队员会帮助那些不怎么擅长运动的人。

en: The paradox of sport is that it bonds as it divides.
zh: 体育运动的矛盾在于，它既能让人团结，也能让人产生分歧。

en: Do you have any interest in sports?
zh: 你对运动感兴趣吗？

en: Some students neglect their studies in favor of sports.
zh: 有些学生为了体育运动耽误了学习。

en: I maintain that sports are a waste of time.
zh: 我坚持认为运动就是浪费时间。

en: Speaking of sports, can you play tennis?
zh: 说到运动，你会打网球吗？

en: Australians excel at sports and entertainment.
zh: 澳大利亚人在体育和娱乐方面非常出色。

en: Talking of sports, what sports do you play?
zh: 说起运动，你平时都玩些什么？

en: When it comes to sports, I can't beat her.
zh: 说到运动，我比不过她。

en: When it comes to sports, John is very good.
zh: 提到运动，约翰可是个高手。

en: In sport, team harmony is vital to success.
zh: 运动中，团队默契是成功的关键。

en: I love music as well as sports.
zh: 我喜欢音乐，也喜欢运动。

en: It's not only the health aspects of sports that appeal to people, but the cooperative aspect that team sports teach, and the competitive aspect in itself.
zh: 运动吸引人的不只是对健康的益处，还有团队协作精神和竞争本身。

en: Some people like sports, and others don't.
zh: 有的人喜欢运动，有的人则不喜欢。

en: I love sports. I get that from my father.
zh: 我超爱运动，这点是随我爸。

en: The spokesman confirmed that the report was true.
zh: 发言人证实了那份报告是真的。

en: Could you spell it, please?
zh: 麻烦您拼一下好吗？

en: Everything is on schedule.
zh: 一切都在按计划进行。

en: Everything happened all at once.
zh: 所有的事一下子全发生了。

en: You must be doing wonderfully in everything.
zh: 你肯定在各方面都做得非常出色。

en: All systems are go.
zh: 所有系统准备就绪。

en: We must surrender them all.
zh: 我们必须把它们全部交出来。

en: Everything was as it had been when I left there.

zh: 综合考虑，我们不能说这是错的。

en: The wild beasts all gather.

en: Suddenly all the lights went out.

en: Not all the books are worth reading.

en: Lay down all arms.
zh: 放下所有武器。

en: It all started in Montgomery, Alabama, on December 1, 1955.
zh: 这一切都始于1955年12月1日的阿拉巴马州蒙哥马利市。

en: All horses are animals, but not all animals are horses.
zh: 所有的马都是动物，但并不是所有的动物都是马。

en: You must give up the idea that you are superior to them in every respect.

en: I agreed with you in all your views.

zh: 我发现那时候商店全关门了。

en: Not all birds can fly.

zh: 不是每种鸟都会唱歌。

zh: 聚会上每个男生都该系领带。

en: All the villages were beautiful.

zh: 我们的老师都很年轻，而且很热爱教学。

en: You should regard the rights of all.

en: All human beings are legally equal.

zh: 那照亮每一个人的真光，正来到世上。

en: It is by no means easy to please everybody.
zh: 想让所有人都满意真的一点都不容易。

en: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time; but you cannot fool all the people all of the time.
zh: 你可以在某些时候欺骗所有人，也可以在所有时候欺骗某些人，但你不能在所有时候欺骗所有人。

en: Everybody must be subject to law.

en: Everyone should exercise their right to vote.

en: Everybody has his merits and demerits.

en: All men have equal rights.

en: All men are created equal.

en: All people breathe air.

en: All men are equal before God.

en: A friend to everybody is a friend to leisure.
zh: 跟谁都交朋友的人，其实是贪图清闲。

en: You should set a high value on every man's life.

en: It goes without saying that everybody is given the equal right to speak.
zh: 不用说，每个人都有平等的发言权。

en: So that through him all man might believe.
zh: 好让大家通过他都能相信。

en: Not everybody knows about my plan.

en: Not everyone can realize the dreams of his youth.
zh: 不是每个人都能实现年轻时的梦想。

en: We have enough seats for everyone.

en: Nobody ever wants to be without money.

en: Every man cannot be a hero.

en: It is not easy to be understood by everybody.

zh: 每个实验都需要一个受保护的环境和完全客观的心态。

en: Taking all things into consideration, I think they were mistaken in it.

en: All children are potential geniuses.

zh: 斯芬克斯开始围着他转。

zh: 斯芬克斯吃掉了几百个去底比斯城的人，因为他们答不出狡猾的斯芬克斯出的谜语。

en: Driving too fast is dangerous.

zh: 演讲结束时，她重复了那个词。

en: The speech contest was held under the auspices of the Ministry of Education.
zh: 演讲比赛是在教育部的支持下举办的。

en: The speech contest took place on the ninth of November.

en: She is by far the best player in that country.
zh: 她绝对是那个国家最好的选手。

en: Sometimes the most inspired ideas seem to just come from out of the blue.
zh: 有时候最有灵感的点子就像凭空冒出来的一样。

en: With the sun shining bright, we should go for a swim.
zh: 阳光这么好，咱们去游泳吧。

en: It's worth going to Bali because you can see the amazing sunset.
zh: 巴厘岛挺值得去的，那里的落日美极了。

en: When one has a wonderful dream, one doesn't wish to come down to earth.
zh: 做好梦的时候，谁都不想回到现实中来。

en: It's a nice day, isn't it?
zh: 今天天气不错，是吧？

en: The beautiful weather added to our pleasure.
zh: 好天气让我们玩得更尽兴了。

en: Beautiful day, isn't it?
zh: 天气真好，不是吗？

en: The weather was gorgeous.
zh: 天气好极了。

en: Thank you for the wonderful gift.
zh: 谢谢你送我这么棒的礼物。

en: What a marvelous person your brother is!
zh: 你哥哥真是个了不起的人！

en: He was a wonderful man, that uncle of yours.
zh: 你那个叔叔人特别好。

en: He was a wonderful man.

en: Have a wonderful eating experience.
zh: 祝你用餐愉快。

en: Thank you for the wonderful meal.
zh: 谢谢你准备的这顿大餐，太好吃了。

en: It was a lovely autumn evening.
zh: 那是一个很美的秋夜。

en: A bright idea occurred to me.
zh: 我突然想到一个好主意。

en: A splendid idea occurred to John.
zh: 约翰想到一个绝妙的主意。

en: A magnificent sight presented itself before us.
zh: 一幅壮丽的景象展现在我们面前。

en: A glorious sight burst on our view.
zh: 壮丽的景色映入眼帘。

en: We had a wonderful holiday.
zh: 我们假期玩得很开心。

en: This is a splendid house.
zh: 这房子真漂亮。

en: A great party that was.
zh: 那次派对太棒了。

en: I've got a splendid idea.
zh: 我有个绝妙的主意。

en: Thank you so much for having been the nice N.Y. contact that you are.
zh: 非常感谢你作为纽约这边的联系人给予的帮助。

en: Quickly she opened the letter.
zh: 她飞快地拆开了信。

en: Quickly he got down the stairs.
zh: 他飞快地跑下了楼。

en: I like to add basil to season my spaghetti sauce.
zh: 我喜欢加点罗勒给意面酱调味。

en: The spy sent information by code.
zh: 间谍用密码发送信息。

en: I'm not used to spicy food.
zh: 我不怎么能吃辣。

en: A spy may be about.

en: In other words, he doesn't want to do it.
zh: 换句话说，他就是不想干。

en: That is to say, a language is something that we learn and are taught, not something that we know by instinct.
zh: 也就是说，语言是学来的，不是天生就会的。

en: In other words, the merits, etc. of making detours are the consideration of the attitudes of the landowners whose property the line would cross, the convenience of other towns and villages, as well as connection with other railway lines.
zh: 换句话说，绕道的优点在于兼顾了地主的态度、周边城镇的便利，以及与其他铁路线的接驳。

en: Where can I buy snacks?

en: The straw appears bent at the place where it enters the water.
zh: 吸管插在水里的地方看着是弯的。

en: It's necessary to avoid stress.
zh: 得学会避开压力。

en: The methods used to overcome stress are different for men and women: drinking is the major method used by men, while women deal with stress by chatting.
zh: 男女应对压力的方式不同：男的爱喝酒，女的爱找人聊天。

en: Common causes of stress are work and human relationships.
zh: 压力通常来自工作和人际关系。

en: The stress began to tell on his heart.
zh: 压力开始影响他的心脏了。

en: I'm feeling stressed.
zh: 我觉得压力好大。

en: Stratford-on-Avon, where Shakespeare was born, is visited by many tourists every year.
zh: 每年都有很多游客去莎士比亚的故乡埃文河畔斯特拉特福参观。

en: The strikers called off the strike of their own accord.
zh: 罢工的人主动停止了罢工。

en: Will the strike affect the price of coal?

en: The strike affected the nation's economy.
zh: 罢工影响了国家经济。

en: The strike was to little purpose.

zh: 因为罢工，我不得不取消了旅行。

en: A strike is a mass refusal to work by a body of employees.
zh: 罢工就是员工集体拒绝工作。

en: A strike disrupted the postal system.
zh: 罢工使邮政系统瘫痪了。

en: The coal in the stove is burning.
zh: 炉子里的煤正烧着呢。

en: Warm up using the stove.
zh: 用炉子烤烤火暖和一下。

en: Please remove the ashes from the stove.
zh: 请清理一下炉子里的灰。

en: Can I play the stereo?
zh: 我能放会儿音响吗？

en: Turn down the stereo.
zh: 把音响声音关小点。

en: Put a record on the stereo.
zh: 放张唱片听听。

en: Stella really is dead!
zh: 斯特拉真的死了！

en: This is also part of your work, as I told you before.
zh: 就像我之前说的，这也是你工作的一部分。

en: There's no use crying over spilt milk.
zh: 事已至此，后悔也没用了。

en: A considerable amount of time and effort have been spent already.
zh: 已经投入了大量的时间和精力。

en: I already told you.
zh: 我早就跟你说了。

en: Twenty years already passed.
zh: 二十年已经过去了。

en: A nice boy talked to Kate.
zh: 有个挺不错的男生跟凯特搭了话。

en: It was very kind of you to give me a nice gift.
zh: 谢谢你送我这么好的礼物。

en: That's a gorgeous color. What kind of beer is that?
zh: 这颜色真漂亮，这是什么啤酒？

en: This is a nice restaurant. Thanks for bringing me here.
zh: 这家餐厅真不错，谢谢你带我来。

en: What a beautiful sweater!
zh: 这件毛衣真漂亮！

en: That's a nice T-shirt.
zh: 那件T恤挺好看的。

en: The man dancing on the stage is my uncle.
zh: 舞台上跳舞的那个人是我叔叔。

en: Eat up the steak and then you can have a candy.
zh: 把牛排吃完，然后你就能吃糖了。

en: I like my steak medium.
zh: 我的牛排要五分熟。

en: Steak is my favorite dish.
zh: 牛排是我最爱吃的菜。

en: Steak lies heavy on the stomach.
zh: 牛排不太好消化，吃完胃里沉甸甸的。

en: I like my steak rare.
zh: 我的牛排要三分熟。

en: How would you like your steak?
zh: 你的牛排要几分熟？

en: The beefsteak tasted marvelous.
zh: 那块牛排味道棒极了。

en: How would you like your steak done?
zh: 你的牛排想做成几分熟？

en: I have steak, eggs, hash browns, toast, and coffee.
zh: 我有牛排、鸡蛋、薯饼、吐司和咖啡。

en: I would like steak with a baked potato.
zh: 我要一份牛排配烤土豆。

en: Steak is often accompanied by red wine.
zh: 吃牛排通常会配红酒。

en: Steak and red wine make a good combination.
zh: 牛排和红酒很搭。

en: We dined off steak and salad.
zh: 我们的晚餐是牛排和沙拉。

en: Steak and caviar are my favorite dishes.
zh: 牛排和鱼子酱是我最喜欢的菜。

en: Steve was loved by all.
zh: 大家都挺喜欢史蒂夫的。

en: Steve had to shell out $50.00 for the speeding ticket he got last week.
zh: 史蒂夫上周因为超速罚单不得不掏了50美金。

en: Steve is a man of good character.
zh: 史蒂夫这人品行很好。

en: Steve did not come home.
zh: 史蒂夫没回家。

en: Steve told me the tale of his travels.
zh: 史蒂夫给我讲了他的旅行故事。

en: Steve looked very happy.
zh: 史蒂夫看起来很高兴。

en: Steve is getting on the bus.
zh: 史蒂夫正在上公交车。

en: Steve goes to school with Kate.
zh: 史蒂夫和凯特一起上学。

en: Steve will get married to Nancy next week.
zh: 史蒂夫下周要和南希结婚了。

en: Steve and Jane always walk to school arm in arm.
zh: 史蒂夫和简总是手挽手走路去学校。

en: Did you sleep well last night, Steve?
zh: 史蒂夫，你昨晚睡得好吗？

en: Steve, I heard you were the baby of the family.
zh: 史蒂夫，听说你是家里最小的孩子。

en: Do you have Stevie Wonder's new album?
zh: 你有史蒂夫·汪德的新专辑吗？

en: No good apple on a sour stock.
zh: 坏树结不出好果子。

en: Steve received a letter from Jane.
zh: 史蒂夫收到了简的一封信。

en: You must be a good walker to have walked all the way.
zh: 你能一路走过来，体力肯定很好。

en: I want to be with him all the way.
zh: 我想一直陪着他。

en: I have been occupied in reading books.
zh: 我最近一直忙着看书。

en: We've been having good weather.
zh: 最近天气一直挺好的。

en: It has become much warmer.
zh: 天气暖和多了。

en: Years ago this principle was widely recognized.
zh: 很多年前，这个原则是被广泛认可的。

en: I've sat on my heels for so long my legs have fallen asleep.
zh: 我蹲了太久，腿都麻了。

en: He's been batting a thousand.
zh: 他最近事事顺利，表现完美。

en: It's been hot and humid.
zh: 最近一直又热又潮。

en: I've been thinking about it.
zh: 我一直在考虑这件事。

en: Way off in the distance she could see the lights of the city.
zh: 她能看见远处城市的灯火。

en: Look at the cloud over there.
zh: 看那边的云。

en: It was only much later that I came to understand the importance of child education.
zh: 直到很久以后，我才明白幼儿教育的重要性。

en: You should have gone on singing.
zh: 你刚才应该继续唱下去的。

en: What have you been doing?
zh: 你最近在忙什么呢？

en: We saw a lake far below.
zh: 我们看到下方很远的地方有一个湖。

en: We saw a light far away.
zh: 我们看到远处有一盏灯。

en: A ship is seen a long way off.
zh: 老远就能看见一艘船。

en: You never wanted to talk about it.
zh: 你从来都不想提那件事。

en: You left me standing alone here on this road a long, long time ago.
zh: 很久很久以前，你就把我一个人丢在这条路上了。

en: I've clean forgotten.
zh: 我忘得干干净净。

en: I haven't quite finished eating.
zh: 我还没吃完呢。

en: I'm sorry to put you to such great expense.
zh: 让你破费这么多，真不好意思。

en: It's all laid on.
zh: 都安排妥了。

en: A stewardess was rescued from the wreck.
zh: 一名空姐从残骸中被救了出来。

en: The steam shovels dug down three stories on one side and four stories on the other side.
zh: 蒸汽铲在的一边挖了三层楼深，另一边挖了四层。

en: Stan has always carried a torch for Liz.
zh: 斯坦一直暗恋着莉兹。

en: Stallone became famous through film.
zh: 史泰龙是靠拍电影成名的。

en: It was so hot in the stadium that I thought I was going to pass out.
zh: 体育馆里太热了，我感觉自己快要晕过去了。

en: Not all of the staff was present.
zh: 员工没全到。

en: Is the staff meeting held on Monday?
zh: 员工会议是周一开吗？

en: I get along well with all the staff.
zh: 我和所有员工相处得都很好。

en: We have a good negotiator on the staff.
zh: 我们的员工里有一个很厉害的谈判专家。

en: We cannot go into the studio.
zh: 我们进不去录音棚。

en: There were lots of people in the stadium.
zh: 体育馆里有好多人。

en: There were a lot of excited people in the stadium.
zh: 体育馆里到处都是兴奋的人群。

en: When we arrived at the stadium, the game had already started.
zh: 我们到体育馆的时候，比赛已经开始了。

en: Dr. Stein will be with you shortly.
zh: 斯坦医生马上就来见您。

en: With regard to the style this car is best.
zh: 要论款式的话，这辆车是最棒的。

en: Star baseball players are often asked for autographs.
zh: 棒球明星经常会被人要签名。

en: Now that we've got off the mark, we must get through this work.
zh: 既然已经开始了，我们就得把这活儿干完。

en: I got a nasty sting from a wasp.
zh: 我被黄蜂狠狠地蛰了一下。

en: Not a single sparrow was to be heard.
zh: 连一只麻雀叫都听不见。

en: Sparrows were flying about.
zh: 麻雀到处乱飞。

en: Sushi is good, but Thai dishes are better.
zh: 寿司是不错，但泰国菜更好吃。

en: Living life in the fast lane is like burning the candle at both ends.
zh: 生活节奏太快，就像是在透支生命。

en: Regarding Professor Scott's final criticism I have nothing more to add to what I said in my previous reply.
zh: 关于斯科特教授最后的批评，我在之前的回信里已经说过了，没什么好补充的了。

en: Late autumn in Scotland is rather cold.
zh: 苏格兰的深秋挺冷的。

en: Scotland is famous for its woollen textiles.
zh: 苏格兰以羊毛织品闻名。

en: Some songs come from Scotland.
zh: 有些歌是从苏格兰传过来的。

en: The union of Scotland and England took place in 1706.
zh: 苏格兰和英格兰是在1706年合并的。

en: Scotland can be very warm in September.
zh: 苏格兰九月的时候还挺暖和的。

en: Scott was the first man to reach the pole.
zh: 斯科特是第一个到达极点的人。

en: Scott was a contemporary of Byron.
zh: 斯科特和拜伦是同时代的人。

en: Scott received a very strict education.
zh: 斯科特受过很严格的教育。

en: It will not be long before Scott gets well.
zh: 斯科特用不了多久就会好起来的。

en: Scott Hall belongs to the Outsiders.
zh: 斯科特·霍尔是“局外人”组合的。

en: Do you mind waiting for a minute?
zh: 你介意等一分钟吗？

en: I suppose I felt a little jealous.
zh: 我猜我当时有点吃醋。

en: I don't like anything like hard work.
zh: 我一点儿都不喜欢干累活。

en: I had a fine old time.
zh: 我玩得很开心。

en: I am terribly hungry.
zh: 我饿得不行了。

en: Does it hurt a lot?
zh: 疼得厉害吗？

en: I was biting my nails, worrying about you.
zh: 我一直在啃指甲，担心死你了。

en: I feel very sick.
zh: 我觉得很难受。

en: What an awful lot of books you have!
zh: 你的书也太多了吧！

en: It's freezing.
zh: 冻死人了。

en: Can you guess how happy I am?
zh: 你猜我有多开心？

en: It was great. I went to Kyoto.
zh: 挺棒的，我去了京都。

en: That's a lot!
zh: 这么多啊！

en: That's an amazing distance, isn't it?
zh: 这距离够惊人的，是吧？

en: He is going like the devil.
zh: 他跑得飞快。

en: These fireworks are spectacular!
zh: 这些烟花太壮观了！

en: It's amazing, just like that.
zh: 太神了，就这样。

en: What a gorgeous bash!
zh: 这派对也太华丽了吧！

en: It's amazing.
zh: 太不可思议了。

en: Terrific!
zh: 太棒了！

en: Brilliant!
zh: 绝了！

en: That's too much!
zh: 这也太多了吧！

en: God, this place looks great.
zh: 天呐，这地方看起来太棒了。

en: Great! Let's get together sometime.
zh: 太好了！咱们找时间聚聚。

en: Wow!
zh: 哇！

en: The score is 9 to 2 in favor of our school.
zh: 比分是 9 比 2，我们学校领先。

en: The score is one all.
zh: 比分是 1 比 1 平。

en: Dr. Skeleton is known for his study on ghosts.
zh: 斯凯尔顿博士以研究鬼魂而闻名。

en: We'll find more engineers to recover the schedule.
zh: 我们会多找几个工程师来赶进度。

en: In regard to the schedule, I'll let you know later.
zh: 关于进度的事，我晚点再跟你说。

en: I want to talk with the manager about the schedule.
zh: 我想跟经理谈谈进度的事。

en: Don't forget your ice skates.
zh: 别忘了带你的冰鞋。

en: You need to have strong thigh muscles to skate.
zh: 滑冰需要有力的大腿肌肉。

en: Skating is one of my hobbies.
zh: 滑冰是我的爱好之一。

en: We had a lot of fun skating.
zh: 我们滑冰玩得很开心。

en: I like skating better.
zh: 我更喜欢滑冰。

en: Which do you like better, skating or skiing?
zh: 滑冰和滑雪，你更喜欢哪一个？

en: If you want to skate well, you should take it up seriously.
zh: 如果你想滑得好，就得认真练。

en: I hope you'll soon get well.
zh: 希望你早点好起来。

en: The skater spun around like a top.
zh: 那个滑冰的人像陀螺一样旋转。

en: I telephoned him to come at once.
zh: 我打电话让他马上过来。

en: Wait for me. I'll be back in no time.
zh: 等我一下，我马上就回来。

en: Don't be long.
zh: 别去太久。

en: I'll be back in a few minutes.
zh: 我几分钟就回来。

en: It will soon grow light.
zh: 天快亮了。

en: I hope you will answer me soon.
zh: 希望能快点收到你的回复。

en: It is polite of her to write me back at once.
zh: 她马上给我回信，挺有礼貌的。

en: Do your room at once.
zh: 马上收拾你的房间。

en: Enter the room at once.
zh: 马上进房间。

en: I will write to him at once.
zh: 我马上给他写信。

en: I'll soon catch up with you.
zh: 我很快就会赶上你的。

en: It looks like it is going to clear up soon.
zh: 看来天很快就要晴了。

en: Will it clear up soon?
zh: 天会很快放晴吗？

en: You will soon be able to ski well.
zh: 你很快就能滑得很好。

en: You will be in time for the train if you start at once.
zh: 你要是现在出发，就能赶上火车。

en: You'll be in time for the train if you start at once.
zh: 你要是马上动身，就能赶上火车。

en: I intended to start at once.
zh: 我本来打算马上出发的。

en: Leave now, or you'll miss the train.
zh: 现在就走，不然你就赶不上火车了。

en: Start at once, and you will catch up with him.
zh: 马上出发，你就能赶上他。

en: Leave now.
zh: 现在就走吧。

en: Start at once, or you will miss the train.
zh: 快点走吧，不然你就赶不上火车了。

en: Start right now, and you'll catch up with them.
zh: 现在就出发，你能赶上他们的。

en: If you don't start at once, you will be late.
zh: 你要是现在不走，就要迟到了。

en: You must not leave right now.
zh: 你现在千万别走。

en: You had better leave at once.
zh: 你最好马上就走。

en: You don't need to go at once.
zh: 你不用马上就走。

en: Start at once, and you will be in time for school.
zh: 现在就走，上学就不会迟到了。

en: You'd better see a dentist at once.
zh: 你最好马上去看牙医。

en: A start should be made at once.
zh: 得赶紧开始了。

en: Let's start at once and have done with it.
zh: 咱们赶紧开始，速战速决吧。

en: We'll begin work soon.
zh: 我们马上就开始干活。

en: We may as well set to work at once.
zh: 咱们不如现在就开始干吧。

en: Let's begin our work at once.
zh: 咱们赶紧干活吧。

en: I'm coming.
zh: 我这就来。

en: I think it better to go at once.
zh: 我觉得最好现在就走。

en: We may as well go at once.
zh: 咱们不如现在就走吧。

en: Go at once, otherwise you will be late.
zh: 赶紧走吧，不然要迟到了。

en: I'll be along soon.
zh: 我马上就到。

en: Try to make up your mind soon.
zh: 赶紧拿定主意吧。

en: You should notify the police at once.
zh: 你应该马上报警。

en: There is a post office close by.
zh: 这附近就有个邮局。

en: Is there a telephone near by?
zh: 这附近有电话吗？

en: I found at my elbow a pretty girl.
zh: 我发现身边坐着个漂亮的女孩。

en: Get up at once, or you will miss the 7:00 bus.
zh: 快点起床，不然赶不上七点的公交车了。

en: You may go out as long as you come back soon.
zh: 你可以出去，只要早点回来就行。

en: She said she would be back right away.
zh: 她说她马上就回来。

en: You may go out only if you come back soon.
zh: 你只有早点回来，才能出去。

en: You will miss the train, unless you start for the station at once.
zh: 你得马上出发去车站，不然就误了火车了。

en: You'll soon be able to swim.
zh: 你很快就能学会游泳了。

en: Send for the doctor at once.
zh: 赶紧去请医生。

en: Send for the doctor at once, or the patient may get worse.
zh: 赶紧请医生，不然病人病情可能会加重。

en: Send for the doctor at once, or the patient will get worse.
zh: 赶紧请医生，不然病人病情会恶化的。

en: It will soon grow dark.
zh: 天很快就要黑了。

en: Call the doctor right away.
zh: 赶紧给医生打电话。

en: You can't miss it.
zh: 你肯定能找到。

en: It is not enough to read great books once only, however carefully.
zh: 名著只读一遍是不够的，哪怕读得再仔细也一样。

en: Furniture made of good materials sells well.
zh: 用好料子做的家具卖得挺好。

en: Could I have a screwdriver?
zh: 能给我把螺丝刀吗？

en: Scrums are a feature of Rugby football.
zh: 并列争球是橄榄球的一大特色。

en: I look forward to hearing from you soon.
zh: 期待尽快收到你的回信。

en: I hope to hear from you soon.
zh: 希望能快点收到你的消息。

en: You had better get in touch with your parents at once.
zh: 你最好马上和你父母联系。

en: I believe you'll get over it soon.
zh: 我相信你很快就能挺过去。

en: Get ready for the trip at once.
zh: 赶紧收拾行李准备出发吧。

en: Come at once.
zh: 马上过来。

en: Please make your reservations promptly.
zh: 请尽快预订。

en: You should go back right now.
zh: 你现在就应该回去。

en: Come back soon.
zh: 早点回来。

en: I'll be back in a wink.
zh: 我马上就回来。

en: I'll mail you the report in a jiffy, so you won't have to wait long.
zh: 我马上就把报告发给你，不用让你等太久。

en: Please write me a reply soon.
zh: 记得快点给我回信。

en: I will write you back soon.
zh: 我很快会给你回信的。

en: Please write back soon.
zh: 请尽快回信。

en: You can not miss it.
zh: 你肯定不会错过的。

en: I fly into a rage easily.
zh: 我这人很容易发火。

en: Come into the room at once.
zh: 赶紧进屋来。

en: You should go to the hospital at once.
zh: 你得赶紧去趟医院。

en: She will get well soon.
zh: 她很快就会好起来的。

en: You will soon get to like her.
zh: 你很快就会喜欢上她的。

en: He will be able to do the work soon.
zh: 他很快就能上手这工作了。

en: Write to him right away.
zh: 马上给他写信。

en: You've got to write to him quickly.
zh: 你得赶紧给他写封信。

en: You will soon get to like him.
zh: 你很快就会喜欢上他的。

en: Hand in your papers at once.
zh: 马上把卷子交了。

en: You'll soon get used to the climate here.
zh: 你很快就会适应这里的气候的。

en: You get on the phone and call the doctor.
zh: 你赶紧给医生打个电话。

en: We'll check on it right now.
zh: 我们这就去查一下。

en: At once the birds left their nests.
zh: 鸟儿们一下子全飞出了窝。

en: It will soon be breakfast time.
zh: 马上就要到早饭时间了。

en: I want you to go to Osaka right away.
zh: 我想让你马上出发去大阪。

en: I'd like to see the doctor soon.
zh: 我想尽快去看医生。

en: Please be sure to let me know your new address soon.
zh: 记得尽快把新地址告诉我。

en: Soon he needed new clothes.
zh: 很快他就需要买新衣服了。

en: You had better go to bed right away, or your cold will get worse.
zh: 你最好赶紧去睡觉，不然感冒会加重的。

en: You'd better go to bed at once.
zh: 你最好马上睡觉。

en: Should I fill it in now?
zh: 我现在就填吗？

en: A policeman was sent for at once.
zh: 马上叫了警察过来。

en: We will take care of this for you.
zh: 这事儿我们会帮你处理好的。

en: It will be ready soon.
zh: 很快就好了。

en: You shouldn't leave at once.
zh: 你不用马上就走。

en: It occurred to him that he should start at once.
zh: 他突然想到应该马上出发。

en: Let's start right away.
zh: 咱们马上出发吧。

en: Start at once, or you will miss the bus.
zh: 赶紧出发，不然你就赶不上公交车了。

en: Start at once, and you will be in time.
zh: 马上出发，你就来得及。

en: Leave at once.
zh: 赶紧走。

en: Start at once, or you will be late.
zh: 赶紧出发，不然你要迟到了。

en: You'll have to start at once.
zh: 你得马上出发。

en: Must I start at once?
zh: 我非得马上走不可吗？

en: You had better set off at once.
zh: 你最好马上出发。

en: You may as well start at once.
zh: 你还是现在就出发吧。

en: They are champing to start at once.
zh: 他们急不可待地想马上出发。

en: Must I leave at once?
zh: 我得马上走吗？

en: Get out of here immediately!
zh: 马上从这儿滚出去！

en: If we don't hit the road soon, we'll get caught in the morning rush hour traffic.
zh: 咱们再不走就要赶上早高峰了。

en: You don't need to leave right now.
zh: 你不用现在就走。

en: I may as well start at once.
zh: 我还是现在就出发吧。

en: Let's start at once; it's already late.
zh: 咱们赶紧出发吧，已经晚了。

en: Start at once, and you'll be in time for class.
zh: 赶紧出发，你还赶得上上课。

en: Do your homework at once.
zh: 赶紧去写作业。

en: Start at once, and you will catch the bus.
zh: 马上出发，你就能赶上公交车。

en: You had better write the letter at once.
zh: 你最好赶紧写那封信。

en: We need to take care of this immediately.
zh: 我们得马上处理这件事。

en: Will I be able to get well soon?
zh: 我能很快好起来吗？

en: Soon I found myself wanting to meet him and talk to him.
zh: 很快我就发现自己想见见他，跟他聊聊。

en: Get down to your work straight away.
zh: 赶紧干活儿吧。

en: Can you reissue them right away?
zh: 能马上重发一下吗？

en: You had better go at once.
zh: 你最好赶紧走。

en: I'm coming at once.
zh: 我马上就来。

en: Go at once, or you will be late for school.
zh: 赶紧走，不然上学要迟到了。

en: I must go right away.
zh: 我得马上走。

en: You must not jump to conclusions.
zh: 你别急着下结论。

en: Yes, she'll be with you in a minute.
zh: 好的，她马上就过来。

en: We must contact the police at once.
zh: 我们得赶紧报警。

en: We must make up our minds, and that at once.
zh: 我们得赶紧做决定，一刻也别等。

en: I will write to you soon.
zh: 我很快会给你写信。

en: You will soon adjust to living in a dormitory.
zh: 你很快就会习惯住校生活的。

en: I put on my shoes at once.
zh: 我立马穿上了鞋。

en: Get up at once, or you will be late for school.
zh: 赶紧起床，不然上学要迟到了。

en: You will soon get used to the change of climate.
zh: 你很快就会适应这里气候的变化。

en: Provided you come back soon you may go.
zh: 只要你早点回来，就可以去。

en: You'd better go home at once.
zh: 你最好赶紧回家。

en: Please come back at once.
zh: 请马上回来。

en: You may go out as long as you came back soon.
zh: 只要你早点回来，就可以出去。

en: Come and see me right now.
zh: 马上过来见我。

en: You may as well leave home at once.
zh: 你还是赶紧出发吧。

en: Come home at once.
zh: 赶紧回家。

en: They'll be glad if it rains soon.
zh: 要是很快下雨的话，他们会很高兴。

en: Soon you'll get used to living by yourself.
zh: 你很快就会习惯一个人住了。

en: Send for a doctor at once.
zh: 赶紧去请医生。

en: A doctor was called in right away.
zh: 医生马上就被请来了。

en: I shall send for a doctor at once.
zh: 我这就去请医生。

en: The doctor must be sent for at once.
zh: 得赶紧去请医生。

en: You may as well see the doctor at once.
zh: 你还是赶紧去看医生吧。

en: A doctor was sent for at once.
zh: 立马就去请医生了。

en: You had better see a doctor at once.
zh: 你最好赶紧去看医生。

en: It's in plain sight.
zh: 就在眼皮子底下。

en: I hope he'll get better soon.
zh: 我希望他能快点好起来。

en: Hope you'll get better soon.
zh: 祝你早日康复。

en: You will be better soon.
zh: 你很快就会好起来的。

en: I hope you'll be well soon.
zh: 我希望你很快就能痊愈。

en: I look forward to seeing you again very soon.
zh: 期待很快再见到你。

en: You had better do it at once.
zh: 你最好赶紧把它做了。

en: I get hysterical easily.
zh: 我很容易情绪失控。

en: We are not likely to accept another offer any time soon.
zh: 我们短期内不太可能接受别的报价。

en: I'm sorry, but I can't answer right away.
zh: 抱歉，我没法马上给你答复。

en: You'll get used to it in no time.
zh: 你很快就会习惯的。

en: Call up Tom right away.
zh: 赶紧给汤姆打个电话。

en: Let the door be closed at once.
zh: 赶紧把门关上。

en: Unless it rains in Ethiopia soon, there could be severe drought problems.
zh: 除非埃塞俄比亚很快下雨，否则可能会出现严重的干旱问题。

en: Set the table at once.
zh: 赶紧摆好餐具准备吃饭。

en: You had better give up smoking at once.
zh: 你最好赶紧把烟戒了。

en: I found it difficult to solve the problem at once.
zh: 我发现这问题没法一下就解决。

en: You can get over the handicap soon.
zh: 你很快就能克服这个困难。

en: We need to settle this serious matter at once.
zh: 我们得赶紧把这件大事解决了。

en: We'll look into the case at once.
zh: 我们马上就去调查这事儿。

en: Stop speaking right now.
zh: 马上闭嘴。

en: Our sister will be with us soon.
zh: 咱姐很快就过来了。

en: Take this box away soon.
zh: 赶紧把这箱子拿走。

en: You will soon adapt yourself to this new life.
zh: 你很快就会适应新生活的。

en: You will soon get accustomed to living in this country.
zh: 你很快就会习惯这儿的生活的。

en: Send me somebody right away.
zh: 赶紧给我派个人过来。

en: I'll call you back soon.
zh: 我待会儿给你回电话。

en: Leave here at once.
zh: 赶紧离开这儿。

en: Come here at once.
zh: 马上过来。

en: Give us the sign to go soon.
zh: 待会儿给我们个信号就出发。

en: I would appreciate hearing from you soon.
zh: 希望能尽快收到你的回信。

en: Return the money to him at once.
zh: 赶紧把钱还给他。

en: Call the doctor in immediately.
zh: 快把医生叫进来。

en: You should act on the doctor's advice at once.
zh: 你得赶紧按医生的建议去做。

en: I'll put your call through in a minute.
zh: 马上给您转接。

en: You'll be a good player soon.
zh: 你很快就会成为一名优秀的选手的。

en: Get in touch with your agent right away.
zh: 赶紧联系你的经纪人。

en: I recognized your voice right away.
zh: 我一下就听出你的声音了。

en: Soon the cold rain came down.
zh: 没过多久就下起了冷雨。

en: You are to shut the door at once.
zh: 马上把门关上。

en: Do I have to do it right away?
zh: 我必须现在就做吗？

en: I heard a faint sound nearby.
zh: 我听到附近有一声微弱的响动。

en: Get the work started straight away!
zh: 赶紧开始干活！

en: It's just around the corner.
zh: 就在拐角处。

en: Send for the baggage immediately.
zh: 赶紧让人把行李送来。

en: I'll be with you in a second.
zh: 马上就来。

en: I'll be there in a minute.
zh: 我马上就到。

en: Must I go there at once?
zh: 我非得现在就去那儿吗？

en: I had a bowl of noodles at a street nearby.
zh: 我就在附近街上吃了碗面。

en: I readily grasped at his proposal.
zh: 我欣然接受了他的提议。

en: The school bus could not run.
zh: 校车开不了了。

en: A school bus ferries students between the station and the campus.
zh: 有辆校车往返于车站和校园之间接送学生。

en: Is there a school bus?
zh: 有校车吗？

en: I missed the school bus!
zh: 我没赶上校车！

en: Dial 110 at once.
zh: 赶快拨打110。

en: Opportunity makes a thief.
zh: 见财起意。

en: What is sukiyaki made of?
zh: 寿喜烧里都有什么？

en: You were served sukiyaki for dinner, then spent the night and had breakfast. Don't you think you were imposing?
zh: 你在那儿吃了晚餐寿喜烧，还住了一晚吃了早饭。你不觉得太打扰人家了吗？

en: Have you ever tried scuba diving?
zh: 你玩过水肺潜水吗？

en: The scandal has badly damaged his clean image.
zh: 丑闻严重损毁了他的清廉形象。

en: There is nothing more exciting than scuba diving.
zh: 没什么比水肺潜水更刺激的了。

en: Scandal could expose the lie.
zh: 丑闻可能会揭穿谎言。

en: The scandal hurt the company's reputation.
zh: 丑闻损害了公司的声誉。

en: When the scandal broke, the Congressman's constituents were seething.
zh: 丑闻爆发时，这位议员的选民们都气炸了。

en: Take as much as you like.
zh: 想要多少就拿多少。

en: A hungry man is an angry man.
zh: 人一饿就容易发脾气。

en: I'd like to rent skis and ski boots.
zh: 我想租滑雪板和滑雪靴。

en: To ski is a lot of fun.
zh: 滑雪挺好玩的。

en: Skiing is a good form of recreation.
zh: 滑雪是一种很好的消遣方式。

en: I really enjoy skiing.
zh: 我真的很喜欢滑雪。

en: Skiing is my favorite sport.
zh: 滑雪是我最喜欢的运动。

en: The time for skiing has gone by.
zh: 滑雪的季节已经过去了。

en: The season for skiing has gone by.
zh: 滑雪季已经结束了。

en: I think I'll go skiing.
zh: 我觉得我要去滑雪。

en: I'd like to go skiing.
zh: 我想去滑雪。

en: If only I could go skiing.
zh: 我要是能去滑雪就好了。

en: Which is easier, skiing or skating?
zh: 滑雪和滑冰哪个更容易？

en: What do you say we go skiing?
zh: 我们去滑雪怎么样？

en: We skied down to Chamonix.
zh: 我们滑雪到了霞慕尼。

en: Since ski season is almost over, the ski wear that's on sale is all leftovers, so there's nothing that's just my size.
zh: 既然滑雪季快结束了，打折的滑雪服都是挑剩下的，没有适合我的尺寸了。

en: I can ski.
zh: 我会滑雪。

en: I'd like to play a game of squash.
zh: 我想打场壁球。

en: I'd like to try out skydiving.
zh: 我想尝试一下跳伞。

en: Would you please show me that skirt?
zh: 能给我看看那条裙子吗？

en: Should the Suez and Panama Canals be internationalized?
zh: 苏伊士运河和巴拿马运河应该国际化吗？

en: Do you have a bowl for soup?
zh: 你有盛汤的碗吗？

en: Don't make noise while eating soup.
zh: 喝汤的时候别出声。

en: Will you warm up the soup?
zh: 能帮我热一下汤吗？

en: Don't make noises when you eat soup.
zh: 喝汤时不要发出声音。

en: Do not make a noise when you eat soup.
zh: 喝汤时别出声。

en: It's bad manners to make a noise when you eat soup.
zh: 喝汤出声是很不礼貌的。

en: Have your soup without making noise.
zh: 喝汤时安静点，别出声。

en: Don't let the soup get cold.
zh: 别让汤凉了。

en: When you drink soup, don't make any hissing sound.
zh: 喝汤的时候，别发出那种嗞嗞的声音。

en: The soup is not cool.
zh: 汤还不凉。

en: Eat your soup while it is hot.
zh: 趁热把汤喝了吧。

en: The soup-spoon is always on the extreme right.
zh: 汤匙总是放在最右边。

en: There's a hair in my soup.
zh: 我汤里有一根头发。

en: I think the soup needs a bit of salt.
zh: 我觉得汤里需要加点盐。

en: I'll put some salt in the soup.
zh: 我往汤里加点盐。

en: Add more salt to the soup.
zh: 给汤里再多加点盐。

en: The soup is so hot I can't drink it.
zh: 汤太烫了，喝不了。

en: Wait till the soup warms.
zh: 等汤热一点再说。

en: The soup is bubbling in the pot.
zh: 锅里的汤在冒泡。

en: Boil the soup down until it becomes thick.
zh: 把汤熬到浓稠为止。

en: You have the choice of soup or salad.
zh: 你可以选择汤或者沙拉。

en: It comes with soup or salad.
zh: 随餐附送汤或沙拉。

en: Sue picked up a pencil off the floor.
zh: 苏从地板上捡起了一支铅笔。

en: Sue is the best tennis player in our school.
zh: 苏是我们学校网球打得最好的。

en: Sue checked in at the Royal Hotel.
zh: 苏办理了皇家酒店的入住手续。

en: Sue has a big bottom, but she doesn't care.
zh: 苏的屁股挺大的，但她不在乎。

en: Sue is an American student.
zh: 苏是个美国学生。

en: Superman flies as fast as a rocket.
zh: 超人飞得和火箭一样快。

en: The supermarkets are now closed, so we'll have to make do with what is left in the refrigerator.
zh: 超市现在都关门了，我们只能拿冰箱里剩下的东西凑合一下了。

en: The supermarket hired many part-timers.
zh: 超市雇了很多兼职人员。

en: If you're going to the supermarket, will you please bring me back some oranges?
zh: 要是你去超市的话，能帮我带点橙子回来吗？

en: Do you think that those superheroes are endowed with talents we don't possess?
zh: 你觉得那些超级英雄是不是天生就有我们没有的超能力？

en: The old houses were torn down to make room for a supermarket.
zh: 为了给超市腾地方，那些旧房子全被拆了。

en: There's no use for plastic supermarket bags aside from putting trash in them.
zh: 超市的塑料袋除了装垃圾没别的用。

en: Would you go to the supermarket and get some butter?
zh: 你能去超市买点黄油吗？

en: Did you buy any meat in the supermarket?
zh: 你在超市买肉了吗？

en: I'm going to drop by the supermarket.
zh: 我打算顺便去趟超市。

en: Working part-time at a supermarket, I found that some customers were polite whereas others weren't.
zh: 在超市打工的时候，我发现有的顾客很有礼貌，有的就很差劲。

en: Sue and I have always got on well.
zh: 我和苏一直相处得很好。

en: Sue and John decided to take the plunge.
zh: 苏和约翰决定结婚了。

en: He was conspicuous in his suit.
zh: 他穿着那套西装，在人群里特别显眼。

en: It's necessary to take correct measurements when you are tailoring a suit.
zh: 做西装的时候，量准尺寸非常重要。

en: Change into your suit.
zh: 去换上你的西装吧。

en: I hesitate to pay so much for a suit.
zh: 花这么多钱买套西装，我挺犹豫的。

en: Can you manage to carry the suitcase by yourself?
zh: 你一个人拎得动那个行李箱吗？

en: I'll take your suitcase to your room.
zh: 我帮你把行李箱提到房间里去吧。

en: Let me relieve you of your suitcase.
zh: 我来帮你拿行李箱吧。

en: Tighten the strap around the suitcase.
zh: 把行李箱上的带子勒紧点。

en: The suitcase contained nothing but dirty clothes.
zh: 行李箱里全是脏衣服，没别的东西。

en: I think my suitcase was stolen.
zh: 我觉得我的行李箱被偷了。

en: One of my suitcases is missing.
zh: 我的一个行李箱不见了。

en: Don't talk so impudently.
zh: 说话别这么没礼貌。

en: I wish I could play the piano as well as Susie.
zh: 我要是能像苏西那样钢琴弹得那么好就好了。

en: Susie is so constituted that she cannot forgive and forget things.
zh: 苏西那性格，很难做到既往不咎。

en: Susie could not settle her fears.
zh: 苏西没法平复内心的恐惧。

en: Susie loves Japanese music.
zh: 苏西特别喜欢日本音乐。

en: Susie doesn't speak Japanese, and Tom doesn't either.
zh: 苏西不会说日语，汤姆也不会。

en: Susie sat up until midnight, when she heard a strange noise.
zh: 苏西熬到了半夜，突然听见一声怪响。

en: Susie sometimes visits her father's office.
zh: 苏西偶尔会去她爸爸的办公室。

en: Susie can type many times as fast as I can.
zh: 苏西打字的速度比我快好几倍。

en: Susie lent me two books, neither of which I have read as yet.
zh: 苏西借了我两本书，我到现在一本都没看呢。

en: Susie was unable to take part in the game because she wasn't feeling well.
zh: 苏西因为身体不太舒服，没法参加比赛。

en: Susie has a nice smile.
zh: 苏西笑起来很好看。

en: Suzy hopes that Tom will ask her out.
zh: 苏西希望汤姆能约她出去。

en: Susie's hair is very long.
zh: 苏西的头发特别长。

en: Susie's mother is a most beautiful woman.
zh: 苏西的妈妈是个大美女。

en: Susie wasn't very feminine.
zh: 苏西以前没什么女人味。

en: Susan is a good cook.
zh: 苏珊做饭很好吃。

en: Susan may not come, but Betty certainly will.
zh: 苏珊可能不来，但贝蒂肯定会来的。

en: Susan has promised her mother that she will call her to let her know that they have arrived safely.
zh: 苏珊答应了她妈妈，一平安到了就给她打电话。

en: Susan enjoys listening to music.
zh: 苏珊挺喜欢听音乐的。

en: Susan really takes after her mother.
zh: 苏珊长得真像她妈妈。

en: Susan shined her father's shoes.
zh: 苏珊帮她爸爸擦了皮鞋。

en: Susan broke the dish on purpose to show her anger.
zh: 苏珊为了撒气，故意把盘子给摔了。

en: Susan is indifferent to politics.
zh: 苏珊对政治一点儿都不感兴趣。

en: Susan is intelligent, and I expect her to pass the exam easily.
zh: 苏珊很聪明，我觉得她考试肯定能轻轻松松通过。

en: Susan spent the summer vacation at her grandmother's.
zh: 苏珊在奶奶家过的暑假。

en: Susan eats like a bird and leaves most of the food on her plate.
zh: 苏珊吃饭跟猫似的，盘子里总是剩一堆。

en: Susan manages to tell her mother that it is time to say goodbye.
zh: 苏珊总算开口跟她妈妈说该走了。

en: Susan is two years my senior.
zh: 苏珊比我大两岁。

en: Susan is actually your half sister.
zh: 苏珊其实是你同父异母的妹妹。

en: Susan found out where the puppy had come from.
zh: 苏珊查清楚了那只小狗是从哪儿来的。

en: Susan was not playing the piano then.
zh: 苏珊那时候没在弹钢琴。

en: Susan made a dress for Jill.
zh: 苏珊给吉尔做了一件裙子。

en: Susan was terrified.
zh: 苏珊吓坏了。

en: Susan greeted her guests at the door.
zh: 苏珊在门口迎接了客人。

en: Susan is majoring in American history.
zh: 苏珊的主修专业是美国历史。

en: It was very dark in Susan's room.
zh: 苏珊的房间里特别黑。

en: Susan left an hour ago.
zh: 苏珊一个小时前走了。

en: Susan and Bob have flown from London to Sydney, Australia.
zh: 苏珊和鲍勃从伦敦坐飞机去澳大利亚悉尼了。

en: I'm Susan Greene.
zh: 我是苏珊·格林。

en: Susan burst into tears.
zh: 苏珊突然大哭了起来。

en: I'm amazed Sue accepted his proposal.
zh: 苏竟然答应了他的求婚，这让我很吃惊。

en: The population of Sweden is on the increase.
zh: 瑞典的人口正在增长。

en: Sweden has a language of its own.
zh: 瑞典有自己的语言。

en: Dr. Sweet's nature belied his name.
zh: 斯威特医生的性格跟他的名字完全不符。

en: Excuse me, but may I use your telephone?
zh: 打扰一下，我能用下你的电话吗？

en: Excuse me, but is this the right way to the subway station?
zh: 打扰一下，请问去地铁站是走这条路吗？

en: I'm sorry, but that brand of cigarettes is out of stock.
zh: 抱歉，那个牌子的烟没货了。

en: I'm sorry, but I didn't understand what you said in English.
zh: 对不起，我没听懂你刚才说的英语。

en: I'm sorry. It was just a slip of the tongue.
zh: 对不起，刚才只是口误。

en: Sorry, I'm a stranger here.
zh: 抱歉，我对这儿也不熟。

en: I beg your pardon. I didn't think this was your seat.
zh: 对不起，我没想到这是您的位子。

en: I'm sorry. I did you wrong.
zh: 对不起，是我对不住你。

en: Excuse me, could you tell me the way to the post office?
zh: 打扰一下，请问邮局怎么走？

en: You've grown so tall.
zh: 你都长这么高了。

en: It's very warm. Shall I turn on the air conditioner?
zh: 天挺热的，我把空调开开吧？

en: It was nice of you to go to so much trouble.
zh: 真是辛苦你了，费了这么多心。

en: The switch is off.
zh: 开关关着呢。

en: The switch didn't work on time.
zh: 开关没准时起作用。

en: Visitors to Switzerland admire the Alps.
zh: 去瑞士的人都对阿尔卑斯山赞叹不已。

en: While visiting Switzerland, he became ill with pneumonia.
zh: 在瑞士旅游的时候，他得了肺炎。

en: Switzerland is a beautiful country worth visiting.
zh: 瑞士是个值得一去的漂亮国家。

en: Switzerland is famous for its scenic beauty.
zh: 瑞士以风景优美而闻名。

en: Switzerland is a beautiful country.
zh: 瑞士是个美丽的国家。

en: Switzerland is a neutral country.
zh: 瑞士是个中立国。

en: Switzerland is situated between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.
zh: 瑞士位于法国、意大利、奥地利和德国之间。

en: We will be enjoying the beautiful scenery of Switzerland.
zh: 我们要去欣赏瑞士的美景了。

en: Most Swiss people can speak three or four languages.
zh: 大多数瑞士人会说三四门语言。

en: Switzerland boasts many sights.
zh: 瑞士有很多景点。

en: Speaking of Switzerland, have you ever been there in spring?
zh: 说到瑞士，你春天去过那里吗？

en: In Switzerland, spring comes in May.
zh: 在瑞士，春天五月才来。

en: What language do they speak in Switzerland?
zh: 瑞士人说什么语言？

en: Have you bought a watermelon?
zh: 你买西瓜了吗？

en: Watermelons are in season now.
zh: 现在西瓜正当季。

en: I'd like a suite.
zh: 我想要一间套房。

en: We were entranced by the fabulous suite.
zh: 我们被那间豪华套房给迷住了。

en: I have hives.
zh: 我起荨麻疹了。

en: The cymbals clashed.
zh: 镲锵的一声响了。

en: Zimbabwe was once a colony of Britain.
zh: 津巴布韦曾经是英国的殖民地。

en: Cinderella is far fairer than her sisters.
zh: 灰姑娘比她的姐姐们漂亮多了。

en: Cindy dozed off in the middle of her graduation examinations.
zh: 辛迪在参加毕业考试的时候睡着了。

en: It's freezing in this room, Cindy. I can't put up with this cold.
zh: 辛迪，这屋里太冷了，我冻得受不了了。

en: Shinji found it very difficult to adjust himself to life in the new school. However, the fact that he was an EVA pilot made him popular.
zh: 真嗣觉得很难适应新学校的生活。不过，因为他是EVA驾驶员，所以挺受欢迎的。

en: His synchronizing rate left nothing to be desired.
zh: 他的同步率完美得没话说。

en: Who'll be taking over from Cynthia when she retires?
zh: 辛西娅退休后，谁来接她的班？

en: I'd like to reserve a single room.
zh: 我想预订一间单人房。

en: I'd like a single from the 24th for two nights.
zh: 我想订一间24号入住的单人房，住两晚。

en: Would you like a single or a double?
zh: 您想要单人房还是双人房？

en: Single, please.
zh: 请给我单人房。

en: The number of visitors to Singapore has increased year by year.
zh: 去新加坡旅游的人数一年比一年多。

en: Singapore has one big problem.
zh: 新加坡面临着一个很大的问题。

en: How did you like Singapore?
zh: 你觉得新加坡怎么样？

en: Singapore's Central Fund provides pensions.
zh: 新加坡的中央公积金提供养老金。

en: Do you know about Singapore?
zh: 你了解新加坡吗？

en: In Singapore, it is a crime to spit on the ground.
zh: 在新加坡，随地吐痰是犯法的。

en: They fine you in Singapore if you throw trash in the streets.
zh: 在新加坡，乱扔垃圾会被罚款。

en: They teach Chinese as a second national language in Singapore.
zh: 新加坡把中文作为第二国语来教。

en: In Singapore, one way to punish a criminal is to whip him or her.
zh: 在新加坡，惩罚罪犯的一种方式是鞭刑。

en: In Singapore, one method of punishing criminals is to whip them, or hit them several times on the back with a cane.
zh: 在新加坡，惩罚罪犯的一种方法是鞭刑，就是用藤条抽打他们的背部好几次。

en: English is spoken in Singapore.
zh: 新加坡说英语。

en: I'm from Singapore.
zh: 我来自新加坡。

en: Could I have a glass of white wine?
zh: 能给我来杯白葡萄酒吗？

en: I'd like a gin and tonic.
zh: 我想要一杯金汤力。

en: Don't stare at people.
zh: 别盯着人看。

en: It is rude to stare at strangers.
zh: 盯着陌生人看很不礼貌。

en: Polar bears live in the Arctic.
zh: 北极熊生活在北极。

en: Jiro soon arrived at his house.
zh: 次郎很快就到家了。

en: Silvia had a stern father who never praised her.
zh: 西尔维娅的父亲很严厉，从来没夸过她。

en: Jill says that she's happily married, but at times you'd never know it.
zh: 吉尔说她婚后很幸福，但有时候还真看不出来。

en: Jill looked at John sideways.
zh: 吉尔斜眼看了看约翰。

en: Jill is the only girl in our club.
zh: 吉尔是我们俱乐部唯一的女生。

en: Jill saw the movie with Ken.
zh: 吉尔和肯一起看了那部电影。

en: Jill is engaged to Jack.
zh: 吉尔和杰克订婚了。

en: Jill is smart as well as pretty.
zh: 吉尔既聪明又漂亮。

en: Jill has been on the phone with friends for more than two hours!
zh: 吉尔跟朋友打了两个多小时电话了！

en: Do you approve of Jill's new hairstyle?
zh: 你觉得吉尔的新发型怎么样？

en: John and Jill will take their vows as husband and wife next month.
zh: 约翰和吉尔下个月就要宣誓结为夫妻了。

en: The orbit around Sirius is elliptical.
zh: 绕天狼星运行的轨道是椭圆形的。

en: I can never feel at ease among strangers.
zh: 我在陌生人面前总是感觉不自在。

en: Stop playing cat and mouse with me and tell me the news.
zh: 别跟我卖关子了，快告诉我是什么消息。

en: John, you're working too hard. Sit down and take it easy for a while.
zh: 约翰，你太拼命了。坐下来歇会儿吧。

en: Except for John, they all arrived.
zh: 除了约翰，大家都到了。

en: It is hard to convince John.
zh: 很难说服约翰。

en: You can trust John. He will never let you down.
zh: 你可以信任约翰，他绝不会让你失望。

en: John was another great player.
zh: 约翰是另一位非常优秀的球员。

en: John sat with arms crossed.
zh: 约翰双手交叉坐着。

en: John was standing alone with his arms folded.
zh: 约翰独自站着，两手抱在胸前。

en: John talks big.
zh: 约翰爱吹牛。

en: John was busy preparing for his trip.
zh: 约翰正忙着准备旅行。
